fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: All insurance files eg. Insurance Distribution Directive, General Data Protection Regulation, Solvency II, Insurance Block Exemption Regulation etc.  Also files relating to innovation, technology and product liability.  Interested in sustainable finance, capital standards, energy etc.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Technical expert group on sustainable finance #E03588#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3588#Member#C#Taxonomy
membership: ABI (Association of British Insurers) and other relevant national insurance associations eg. GDV.
goals__remit: AIG Europe Limited is a part of AIG, a leading international insurance organisation serving customers across the world. AIG companies serve commercial, institutional and individual customers through one of the most extensive worldwide property-casualty networks of any insurer.
relevant_communication: AIG Europe is monitoring a number of different policy areas potentially impacting insurance business (Insurance Distribution Directive, Solvency II etc) although our activity is mainly through contributing to the position papers of our trade associations (e.g. the Association of British Insurers, who in turn input through Insurance Europe).  Most recently, Suzy Awford attended the Solvency II review briefing conference organised by the European Commission.
